title: Four
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: In the book Four, students are presented with a familiar number in various ways. The text provides information about the number four through detailed, colorful illustrations and simple text. Students will enjoy searching the illustrations for the hidden 4 on each page. Use this book to teach students about plural nouns and finding details to support the main idea.
